name: Test Chamber Wall
description: Standard wall of the testing environment.

name: Observation Room Window
description: Windows where scientists observe the test chamber.

name: Glass Wall
description: Transparent barrier that blocks portal placement.

name: Metal Wall
description: Metallic surface that cannot hold portals.

name: Portal Surface Panel
description: White panel that allows portal placement.

name: Elevator Platform
description: Platform that transports the player between chambers.

name: Moving Platform
description: Platform that moves automatically or through logic.

name: Energy Pellet Launcher
description: Launches an energy pellet that must reach a catcher.

name: Energy Pellet Catcher
description: Receives the energy pellet to activate mechanisms.

name: Door
description: Door that opens when a condition is met.

name: Timed Door
description: Door that stays open for a limited time after activation.

name: Floor Button
description: Pressure plate that activates when weighted.

name: Wall Button
description: Push button on the wall that triggers mechanisms.

name: Exit Elevator
description: Elevator that takes the player out of the test chamber.

name: Radio
description: Environmental object that plays audio. Not a functional item.

name: Turret Base
description: Static base or zone where a turret is placed.

name: Security Camera
description: Fixed camera observing the player. Can be knocked off.
